1432.content:
(Sorry, there was no other place to put in a new character, original selection is offered below)

Joey was not having a good day. No, that wasn't completely true. Joey was not having a good life. At least not since he'd been drafted into the WHAMW wrestling league. And it was all thanks to a pig named Rebecca. When he was nineteen-years-old he'd nearly been eaten alive by two of the league's fighters, a hippo and bear tag-team known as Butt and Gut. Rebecca had saved his life... but at a terrible cost. After forcing him through all manner of humiliation, she'd signed him up in the league while he was unconscious. Now, instead of being dinner for some fat women, he'd become the "training assistant" for the league's ladies for the past five years. Unfortunately, the ladies of WHAMW were not usual fighters. Not only were they usually gigantic and fat, not only were most of them literal man-eaters, but some had either powers that could only be described as magical, or technology supplied from the league that was like something out of a science-fiction B-movie. During that time he'd been subjected to worse torments than he could've ever imagined. It really did say something about the quality of his life that he spent a lot of time wondering if he would've been better off being digested by that hippo. Not that he was curious enough to actually want to find out.

Can Joey survive the horrors of WHAMW? Or should someone else be the focus of this story?
1432.title: Joey the WHAMW Training Assistant

14322.content:
After a rigorous training session with three of the league's heavy fighters, Joey dragged his battered and weary form to his next training partner. The one silver lining is that this was the last fighter he had to train with today. Just another couple more hours of humiliation and he'd be in the clear. A few hours in his ratty apartment wasn't much to look forward to, but Joey decided to keep his cautious optimism.

He entered the special training room supplied by the WHAMW, complete with its own ring, and hobbled inside. His schedule for today had been set in stone except for the last slot. One of his planned partners had to leave work early, so the schedule had shifted to accommodate everyone's schedules. So it was a complete surprise to Joey when he walked in only to see, standing in the center of the ring...
14322.title: Follow Joey

143222.content:
Chiaki the Kunoichi was definitely one of the stranger members of WHAMW, and that was saying something with their current roster. An actual ninja from Japan, her clan was infamous for their strange, and frankly perverse, skills. Though tiny by WHAMW standards, not even reaching 5 and a half feet, her clan's specialty allowed her to control her size and weight. Without warning Chiaki could go from a petite bombshell dressed in a robe and leotard, to a massive monstrosity that could rival even the pig sisters in girth. She could even just expand certain parts of her body to better use her fighting moves. She also had the strange ability to exhale different colored mists that could alter her opponent's body for her own benefit. Why grow to a giant when she could shrink her opponent to the size of a mouse? Why hypothetically flatten someone like a pancake, when another mist would allow her to literally do it?

Joey had trained with her a number of times in the past, and it had never been a pleasant experience. Though, if he really thought about it, none of his training sessions had ever been pleasant experiences. The weird thing about Chiaki, other than the obvious laundry list of skills he just ran through in his head, was how stoic she was. No one could see her expression underneath that veil that covered her mouth, but her red eyes had a creepy intensity to them. She was usually quiet but when she did speak it was in such a dispassionate monotone that Joey never knew if she cared so little about her opponents that she didn't bother thinking of them as people, or if she was some cunningly disguised sadist who hid her more deviant side beneath a disguise of indifference. All these traits put together made her one of the wrestlers that Joey was most genuinely afraid of when training with, since he had no idea what she was possibly thinking and with her skillset, nearly anything was possible.

So was it Chiaki, or was a different wrestler waiting for Joey?
143222.title: Another Wrestler

1432221.content:
Chiaki stood in silence in the center of the ring as she awaited her opponent's arrival. A spotlight was on her and the ring, the rest of the room was darkened. She wore the same type of outfit she usually did, a black leotard somehow modified to look like a Japanese robe. A black case was at her feet. Joey made his way down nervously. Though Chiaki didn't move a muscle, Joey felt her red eyes watching him all the way. When he reached the ring, the door slammed shut ominously behind him. He heard a faint click, like a lock being set. With the light from outside shut out, now pitch blackness surrounded the ring completely. It was almost like Joey and Chiaki were the only two people in the world.

Joey gulped at that frightening thought and tugged his shirt collar. 'Think happy thoughts!' he tried to tell himself. 'This is the last training session of the night! It'll only be another four... hours... Damn.'

"Evening, Chiaki," Joey said, trying to sound friendly. "Been having a good day?"

The Kunoichi didn't respond at first. Her eyes felt like they could've burned holes into his own.

"... Yes," she said in her monotone.

Before Joey could think of anything else to say, Chiaki knelt down and opened the black case. Inside were a number of dusty, sealed scrolls. They looked ancient.

"W-what're those?" Joey asked.

"Scrolls," she said, not looking up.

Joey suppressed an annoyed sigh. "I can see that, I meant, what are they for?"

She didn't answer at first. Instead she just kept looking over her scrolls for a minute. She finally picked one up, almost reverentially, and broke the seal. She unrolled it and for the first time he could remember, he could see an actual emotion in the Kunoichi's eyes: excitement. She read the scroll up and down eagerly, and Joey started to think she had forgotten he was there.

Without taking her eyes off the scroll, she finally answered him. "Centuries ago, my family had scrolls that taught us ways to use our techniques that others couldn't dream of. With them, we were all powerful among the other clans. None could dare oppose us. But one of our ancestors, feared the power that could be unleashed if we were left unchecked, she thought we would be corrupted by it. So she hid them away to protect the world. My clan has been searching for the lost scrolls for centuries... And now, I believe I have found them."

Chiaki straightened and looked Joey dead in the eye, and her stare was enough to make him want to run for the hills. 'Oh,' Joey thought with a surprising calm, 'I'm beyond dead.'

"I joined this league, so I could broadcast my clan's skills to the world and prove our techniques as superior. Millions respect and fear us because of my efforts. But it is not enough. I must show the world my clan's skills, and the lost scrolls are the key to doing so. But first, I must know for certain if these are the scrolls of legend. You will be helping me find out tonight, Johnny."

"Joey," Joey corrected automatically.

Chiaki gave no sign she heard him. She looked over the scroll in her hand again.

"This technique is very interesting," she said, "and very painful for you... Let's get started."

Joey trembled as she began her first technique...

Like Monica, she's no stranger to vanishing people up her ass, but is open to more traditional forms of vore as well.

Their Friends

The (Not So Big) Wolf: Despite stores, this wolf ain't big. coming in at 4'6 and 90 pounds, he's a runt. After trying and failing to chow down on the pig sisters, he's now their servant, kept in line by fear of vanishing up Monica or Rebecca's rear entrance. Abused constantly, he's forced to do anything they say.

Thomas Cattington: Sally's boyfriend. Coming in at 3'2 and 60 pounds. He loves his girlfriend very much, but is a bit put off by all the abuse he gets from her sisters, who love to make him into 'road kill'.

Anyone you want!

Not Allowed:
Death (except by vore)
Gore
Underage

Allowed
Basically anything else!
